TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class AddInBase : IDisposable, Microsoft.Office.Tools.IAddInExtension, System.ComponentModel.IComponent, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AddInBase extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.EntryPoint, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.IAddInExtension, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.IExtension, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.IDisposable, class System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

summary.span: 为使用 Visual Studio 创建的应用程序级外接程序中的 ThisAddIn 类提供基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for the ThisAddIn class in application-level add-ins that you create by using Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供由所有加载项通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的共享的功能。The class provides functionality that is shared by all add-ins that you create by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio. `ThisAddIn`外接程序项目中的类派生其大多数成员从类。The `ThisAddIn` class in add-in projects derives most of its members from the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Programming VSTO Add-ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md)。For more information, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md). ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net4utilities](~/includes/vsto-net4utilities-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法创建以编程方式主机项。You cannot create host items programmatically. 请改用`ThisAddIn`外接程序项目中自动创建的类。Instead, use the `ThisAddIn` class that is automatically created in your add-in project. `ThisAddIn` 类派生自 。The `ThisAddIn` class derives from . 有关详细信息，请参阅[Programming VSTO Add-ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md)。For more information, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md).

summary.span: 获取此 对象扩展的 对象。

value.span: 此 对象扩展的对象。

span.span: The object that this object extends.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于扩展通过实现对象接口。The class extends objects by implementing the interface.

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject() cil managed

summary.span: 返回实现 Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility 接口的对象。

span.span: Returns an object that implements the Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility interface.
An object that implements the Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法以提供 Microsoft Office 应用程序的实现`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口，或者如果你有多个功能区在项目中，并且你想要指定功能区显示在运行时。Override this method to provide the Microsoft Office application an implementation of the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface, or if you have multiple Ribbons in your project and you want to specify which Ribbons to display at run time. 无需重写此方法返回通过使用添加到项目的功能区**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项模板。You do not have to override this method to return Ribbons that you add to the project by using the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item template. 默认情况下，此方法返回对象，表示所有**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项目中的项。By default, this method returns a object that represents all **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** items in the project. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md). 必须重写或方法来返回功能区中的项目中使用添加**功能区 (XML)** 项模板。You must override the or method to return Ribbons in your project that you add by using the **Ribbon (XML)** item template. 详细了解如何重写方法，请参阅[功能区 XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md)。For more information about how to override the method, see [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md). 详细了解如何重写方法，请参阅[自定义 UI 功能 By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md)。For more information about how to override the method, see [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension[] CreateRibbonObjects() cil managed

summary.span: 将 对象的数组返回给 方法。

span.span: Returns an array of objects to the method.

summary.span: 表示“功能区”要显示运行时间的对象。

span.span: The objects represent the Ribbons to display at run time.

returns.span: 表示运行时显示的功能区的 对象的数组。

span.span: An array of objects that represent the Ribbons to display at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现调用此方法方法类时该项目包含**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项。This method is called by the default implementation of the method of the class when the project contains **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** items. 如果你想要指定功能区显示在运行时，重写此方法。Override this method if you want to specify which Ribbons to display at run time. 此外可以重写方法，以指定运行时功能区上显示。You can also override the method to specify which Ribbons to display at run time. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md).

summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要调用方法自己。Do not call the method yourself. 外接程序卸载时，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]清理外接程序使用的所有资源。When the add-in is unloaded, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] cleans up all resources used by the add-in. 有关详细信息方法，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213)。For more information about the method, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnShutdown() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要运行代码，只需外接程序卸载之前，将代码添加到`ThisAddIn_Shutdown`中的方法`ThisAddIn`类。To run code just before the add-in is unloaded, add code to the `ThisAddIn_Shutdown` method in the `ThisAddIn` class. 此方法是默认事件处理程序事件。This method is a default event handler for the event. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md)。For more information, see [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md). 有关详细信息`ThisAddIn`类，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md)。For more information about the `ThisAddIn` class, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要运行的代码加载外接程序时，将代码添加到`ThisAddIn_Startup`中的方法`ThisAddIn`类。To run code when the add-in is loaded, add code to the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method in the `ThisAddIn` class. 此方法是默认事件处理程序事件。This method is a default event handler for the event. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md)。For more information, see [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md). 有关详细信息`ThisAddIn`类，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md)。For more information about the `ThisAddIn` class, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object RequestComAddInAutomationService() cil managed

summary.span: 返回您的外接程序中可以供其他解决方案使用的对象。

span.span: Returns an object in your add-in that can be used by other solutions.

returns.span: 要向其他解决方案公开的对象。

span.span: An object that you want to expose to other solutions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法以公开外接程序向其他解决方案中的对象。Override this method to expose an object in your add-in to other solutions. 这包括其他外接程序和文档级自定义项中的相同应用程序进程、 VBA 代码和外部自动化代码运行。This includes other add-ins and document-level customizations running in the same application process, VBA code, and external automation code. 返回的对象必须是公共的它必须是对于 COM 可见，并且必须公开[IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)接口。The object that you return must be public, it must be visible to COM, and it must expose the [IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5) interface. 如果您返回的对象不满足这些要求[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]将引发后它会调用您的实现。If the object you return does not meet these requirements, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] will throw an after it calls your implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从其他 Office 解决方案调用 VSTO 外接程序中的代码](/visualstudio/vsto/calling-code-in-vsto-add-ins-from-other-office-solutions.md)。For more information, see [Calling Code in VSTO Add-ins from Other Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/calling-code-in-vsto-add-ins-from-other-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 有关演示如何重写的代码示例方法，请参阅[演练： VSTO 外接程序中从 VBA 调用代码](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-calling-code-in-a-vsto-add-in-from-vba.md)。For a code example that demonstrates how to override the method, see [Walkthrough: Calling Code in a VSTO Add-in from VBA](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-calling-code-in-a-vsto-add-in-from-vba.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object RequestService(valuetype System.Guid serviceGuid) cil managed

param.name: serviceGuid
param.span: 一个 ，用于标识 Microsoft Office 应用程序支持的扩展性接口。

span.span: A that identifies an extensibility interface that is supported by Microsoft Office applications.

summary.span: 返回一个对象，该对象可扩展 Microsoft Office 应用程序中的一个功能。

span.span: Returns an object that extends a feature in a Microsoft Office application.

returns.span: 一个对象，可实现由 标识的扩展性接口。

span.span: An object that implements the extensibility interface that is identified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法在应用程序级外接程序来实现扩展性接口来扩展 Microsoft Office 应用程序中的功能。Override this method in an application-level add-in to implement an extensibility interface that extends a feature in a Microsoft Office application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义 UI 功能 By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md)。For more information, see [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md). 当你重写此方法时，检查的值`serviceGuid`参数，以确定请求的可扩展性接口时，，然后返回实现该接口的对象。When you override this method, check the value of the `serviceGuid` parameter to determine which extensibility interface is being requested, and then return an object that implements the interface. 加载外接程序时，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用的应用程序，支持的每个接口的一个或多个时间且它将返回值发送到加载外接程序的 Microsoft Office 应用程序。When your add-in is loaded, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls one or more times for each interface that is supported by the application, and it sends the return value to the Microsoft Office application that is loading your add-in. 有关外接程序的加载过程的详细信息，请参阅[Architecture of VSTO 外接程序](/visualstudio/vsto/architecture-of-vsto-add-ins.md)。For more information about the load process of add-ins, see [Architecture of VSTO Add-ins](/visualstudio/vsto/architecture-of-vsto-add-ins.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果你通过自定义功能区用户界面创建自己的实现`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口或通过添加**功能区 (XML)** 项到项目中，或者可以替代方法而不是方法。If you are customizing the Ribbon UI by creating your own implementation of the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface or by adding a **Ribbon (XML)** item to your project, you can alternatively override the method instead of the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md)并[功能区 XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md) and [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md). ## Examples 有关代码示例演示如何实现扩展性接口并重写方法，请参阅[自定义 UI 功能 By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md)。For a code example that demonstrates how to implement an extensibility interface and override the method, see [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md).

summary.span: 当外接程序即将卸载时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the add-in is about to be unloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用默认中的事件处理程序`ThisAddIn`类，而不是创建您自己为此事件的事件处理程序。Use the default event handler in the `ThisAddIn` class, instead of creating your own event handler for this event. 默认值事件处理程序命名为`ThisAddIn_Shutdown`。The default event handler is named `ThisAddIn_Shutdown`. 在 Outlook 2010 中， Outlook 退出时不会引发事件。In Outlook 2010, the event is not raised when Outlook exits. 但是，将引发此事件，当用户禁用外接程序通过使用**COM 加载项**在 Outlook 中的对话框。However, this event is raised when the user disables the add-in by using the **COM Add-ins** dialog box in Outlook. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md)。For more information, see [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md). 有关详细信息`ThisAddIn`类，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md)。For more information about the `ThisAddIn` class, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md).

summary.span: 在加载外接程序、且程序集中的所有初始化代码都已运行时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the add-in is loaded, after all the initialization code in the assembly has run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用默认中的事件处理程序`ThisAddIn`类，而不是创建您自己为此事件的事件处理程序。Use the default event handler in the `ThisAddIn` class, instead of creating your own event handler for this event. 默认值事件处理程序命名为`ThisAddIn_Startup`。The default event handler is named `ThisAddIn_Startup`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md)。For more information about, see [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md). 有关详细信息`ThisAddIn`类，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md)。For more information about the `ThisAddIn` class, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md).
